description: Generates suggestions for addresses and points of interest based on partial or misspelled free-form text. This operation is also known as autocomplete, autosuggest, or fuzzy matching. Optional parameters let you narrow your search results by bounding box or country, or bias your search toward a specific position on the globe.

parameters.name: IndexName
parameters.description: The name of the place index resource you want to use for the search.

parameters.name: Text
parameters.description: The free-form partial text to use to generate place suggestions. For example, eiffel tow.

parameters.name: BiasPosition
parameters.description: An optional parameter that indicates a preference for place suggestions that are closer to a specified position. If provided, this parameter must contain a pair of numbers. The first number represents the X coordinate, or longitude; the second number represents the Y coordinate, or latitude. For example, [-123.1174, 49.2847] represents the position with longitude -123.1174 and latitude 49.2847. (float) ---

parameters.name: FilterBBox
parameters.description: An optional parameter that limits the search results by returning only suggestions within a specified bounding box. If provided, this parameter must contain a total of four consecutive numbers in two pairs. The first pair of numbers represents the X and Y coordinates (longitude and latitude, respectively) of the southwest corner of the bounding box; the second pair of numbers represents the X and Y coordinates (longitude and latitude, respectively) of the northeast corner of the bounding box. For example, [-12.7935, -37.4835, -12.0684, -36.9542] represents a bounding box where the southwest corner has longitude -12.7935 and latitude -37.4835, and the northeast corner has longitude -12.0684 and latitude -36.9542. (float) ---

parameters.name: FilterCountries
parameters.description: An optional parameter that limits the search results by returning only suggestions within the provided list of countries. Use the ISO 3166 3-digit country code. For example, Australia uses three upper-case characters: AUS. (string) ---

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: An optional parameter. The maximum number of results returned per request. The default: 5

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: The preferred language used to return results. The value must be a valid BCP 47 language tag, for example, en for English. This setting affects the languages used in the results. If no language is specified, or not supported for a particular result, the partner automatically chooses a language for the result. For an example, we'll use the Greek language. You search for Athens, Gr to get suggestions with the language parameter set to en. The results found will most likely be returned as Athens, Greece. If you set the language parameter to el, for Greek, then the result found will more likely be returned as ÎÎ¸Î®Î½Î±, ÎÎ»Î»Î¬Î´Î±. If the data provider does not have a value for Greek, the result will be in a language that the provider does support.

parameters.name: FilterCategories
parameters.description: A list of one or more Amazon Location categories to filter the returned places. If you include more than one category, the results will include results that match any of the categories listed. For more information about using categories, including a list of Amazon Location categories, see Categories and filtering, in the Amazon Location Service Developer Guide. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The free-form partial text input specified in the request.

nested_items.name: BiasPosition
nested_items.description: Contains the coordinates for the optional bias position specified in the request.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: FilterBBox
nested_items.description: Contains the coordinates for the optional bounding box specified in the request.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: FilterCountries
nested_items.description: Contains the optional country filter specified in the request.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MaxResults
nested_items.description: Contains the optional result count limit specified in the request.

nested_items.name: DataSource
nested_items.description: The geospatial data provider attached to the place index resource specified in the request. Values can be one of the following:
Esri.
Grab.
Here.

nested_items.name: Language
nested_items.description: The preferred language used to return results. Matches the language in the request. The value is a valid BCP 47 language tag, for example, en for English.

nested_items.name: FilterCategories
nested_items.description: The optional category filter specified in the request.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Results
nested_items.description: A list of place suggestions that best match the search text.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The text of the place suggestion, typically formatted as an address string.

nested_items.name: PlaceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Place. You can use this with the GetPlace operation to find the place again later, or to get full information for the Place.

nested_items.name: Categories
nested_items.description: The Amazon Location categories that describe the Place.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SupplementalCategories
nested_items.description: Categories from the data provider that describe the Place that are not mapped to any Amazon Location categories.
(string) ---
